name: Retrowave Starship FoxMcDonald
description:
Retrowave Starship FoxMcDonald is a synthwave retro space shooter where you have to destroy all the enemies in order to complete the game!

Commander! Select your favorite starship to complete your mission! Every starship has different stats, choose wisely!

WASD - Movement

Q E  - Barrel Roll

SHIFT - Brake

SPACE - Turbo

L - Shoot

Peste Team is a subdivision of CodeDrifters formed by 4 of their members. This game was made for a university project using Ogre3D and Bullet.
